directions: Place a heavy pot over medium heat. Add onions and ground beef and cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbled and onions begin to turn translucent, about 5 minutes. Drain grease from pot.

Pour in beef broth; add beans, tomatoes, corn and Knorr(R) Fiesta Sides - Taco Rice. Stir in 1 buttery spread. Bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender, about 7 minutes.
Remove pot from heat; let pot stand at least 2 minutes. Stir. Serve topped with shredded cheese and sour cream.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
1 (6 ounce) package Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ - Taco Rice
1/2 cup shredded cheese, or more to taste
1/2 cup sour cream, or more to taste
title: One-Pot Taco Chili
